summary:
Whether working with film, music video’s or videomarketing; my no.1 goal is to present a new world. Vivid, enthralling and one of a kind!

Personal highlights:

• Demonstrated ability to achieve difficult objectives and break new ground in low-budget productions. Solid skills in improving production value while staying within budget.
• Familiar with the new and social media and their mechanics. Obtained an understanding of viral marketing by gaining a digital audience of well over 20 million people worldwide through several personally developed productions.
•  Work crafted over the past five years has been screened on more then 20 (international) film festivals and received a total of seven awards deriving from different competitions. 
• Accustomed to (as well as fond of) working with large, international and multi-language crews for both film, music video, corporate and documentary productions. 
• Knowledge of and special interest in iconography, the mechanism of modern pop culture and its effect on society. Also familiar with the use of esotericism and mythology as a visual narrative.
• Proficient in using mythic and conventional story structure for screenwriting regardless of the production format. 
• A comprehensive array of experience in every corner of every department. Ranging from an understanding of the power tools of art, to the lenses of electrical, to the graphic interfaces of editorial and vfx.
